#summary palevioletred is a color keyword defined in CSS and usable wherever a color value is required.
#labels about-css

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [CSSReference CSS Reference] > [CSSColors Colors] > *palevioletred*

== Value ==

The `palevioletred` color keyword is equivalent to `#db7093`, except in Safari, which treats it as `#d87093`.

[CSSColors List of CSS color constants]
